channel.title: CVE Feed for Ricoh Company, Ltd. -- Printer Driver Packager NX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ricoh Company, Ltd. -- Printer Driver Packager NX

item.title: CVE-2023-30759|2023-06-19T00:00:00 -- ricoh%20company%2C%20ltd. -- printer%20driver%20packager%20nx
item.description: The driver installation package created by Printer Driver Packager NX v1.0.02 to v1.1.25 fails to detect its modification and may spawn an unexpected process with the administrative privilege. If a non-administrative user modifies the driver installation package and runs it on the target PC, an arbitrary program may be executed with the administrative privilege.
